dialogue.htmlContent: As you are walking through the alley way, you hear yelling in the distance.​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​ Intrigued, you follow the voice and find yourself at an intersection.​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​ As you near the junction, a woman runs past you, entirely ignoring your presence.​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​ Tears rolling down her cheeks as she escapes the premises, you can make out a muttered ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​[​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​genericFemale.​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​say(.​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​.​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​monster.​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​)] escaping the woman’s lips as she huffs and puffs out of the scene with a wobble in her steps.

You came back to the intersection where you saw that woman running. You wounder if you are ready to fight whatever or whoever is there.

Are you ready to investigate?

​Wondering what caused the woman to flee the scene, you decide to investigate the alley she just stormed out of.​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​ You step into the corridor and, at first glance, nothing seems suspicious.

As you were just about to turn back, you hear a soft wine coming from behind a container.​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​ As you look closer you realise that someone is hiding under a rag next to the large metal box.

The rag-covered stranger soon realises that you found them.​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​ [pixie.She] raises her head, revealing her cute features.​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​ [pixie.Her] teary ​​​​​​​​​​​​​[​​​​​​​​​​​​​pixie.​​​​​​​​​​​​​eyeColor(true)] ​​​​​​​​​​​​[​​​​​​​​​​​​pixie.​​​​​​​​​​​​eyes] lock on yours and [pixie.she] shakingly shouts ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​[​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​pixie.​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​say(What do you want! I’m not a roadside freak show! Go Away!)].​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​ You can’t help yourself and ask ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​[​​​​​​​​​​​​​​player.​​​​​​​​​​​​​​say(Are you alright? A woman just passed by me saying something about a monster?)] to which the small figure yelled back ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​[​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​pixie.​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​say(THAT WOMAN WAS MY MOTHER!!! She gave birth to me and my sister in this alleyway.​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​.​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​ As soon as she could, my sister left but when I first laid eyes on my mother she was in such a bad shape that I decided to stay and make sure she was alright, but as soon as she woke up-)]

[pixie.HerPro] sentence was cut short by [pixie.herPro] knees suddenly buckling.​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​ As [pixie.she] seemingly about to collapse, you propose to sit down side by side against the wall.​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​ ​​​​​​​​​​​[​​​​​​​​​​​pixie.​​​​​​​​​​​say(A- as soon as she saw my ​​​​​​​​​​[​​​​​​​​​​pixie.​​​​​​​​​​horns] she started shouting and saying that I’m- a- a monster!)]

Tears rolling down her cheeks as [pixie.she] recounts the events that just unfolded.

​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​After finishing [pixie.herPro] sentence, a few seconds of silence pass and [pixie.her] crying turns into heavy sobbing.​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​ To comfort [pixie.herPro] you, wrap your arms around her petite body.​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​ You softly tell her ​​​​​​​​​[​​​​​​​​​player.​​​​​​​​​say(It’s okay sweetie, she must have had her reasons.​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​ You’re in safe hands now, don’t worry.​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​ What’s your name, honey?)] through the wails and bawls, she answers ​​​​​​​​[​​​​​​​​pixie.​​​​​​​​say(Pixie)], wrapping her ​​​​​​[​​​​​​pixie.​​​​​​arms+] around your torso and squeezing you as tightly as she can.​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​

You stay with her and let her empty out her emotions and pent up stress until, after several minutes, you hear someone walking steadily down the alley towards you both.​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​

[npc.say(Well... well... well... What do we have here! Isn't it a cute display that we have here. All that cutness just made me so HORNY.)] As [npc.he] finish [npc.his] sentence, [npc.he] charge toward you.

(Affection +)

The young [pixie.gender] looks at you as [pixie.she] wipes [pixie.herPro] tears, stands up and yell [pixie.say(No!)]. You turn around to face [pixie.her] and [pixie.she] wobbles closer. You look at [pixie.her] with a neutral face and ask [pixie.her] [player.say(What do you want?)]. [pixie.She] looks at you, clearly confused, upset and exhausted and replies [pixie.say(I- I don’t know…)].[player.say(Well it's not an answer like that that'll keep me interested.)] you say as you look down at [pixie.her]. [player.say(What’s your name?)] you ask. [pixie.say(Give me a reason to not just walk out of this alleyway and leave you to your whining.)]. [player.say(Well it's either that or the comforting, cold dampness of a back-alley filled with rats and violators. Your pick!)]. You shrug and size [pixie.her] up, looking up and down [pixie.her] lithe, nimble body. [player.say(She could be a great addition to the harem, I know a few people who'd like a taste of a demi-succubus.)] you think to yourself as you barely manage to hide your devilish grin.

[pixie.She] looks back at you reluctantly and says [pixie.say(Okay fine, I'll join you, you can call me [pixie.name].)].
